title: Do dietary exposures to multi-class endocrine disrupting chemicals translate into health risks for Gangetic dolphins? An assessment and way forward
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Ruchika Sah, Gautam Talukdar, Megha Khanduri, Pooja Chaudhary, Ruchi Badola, Syed Ainul Hussain
